name: Red Nine
description:
Turn-based Tactical War Game. Features a nine level story campaign.

Controls

  • Mouse Controls:
    • Move - move cursor
    • Left - select/accept
    • Middle - intelligence view
    • Right - cancel
  • Keyboard Controls:
    • Directional Keys - move cursor
    • Z - select/accept
    • X - intelligence view
    • C - cancel

First version created as month 9 of 12

  • Idea
  • Retrospective
